dc_description_s: This study is an Ipsos Canada call poll during the 42nd Canada General Election (2015), performed October 15-17, 2015. This survey examines voter attitudes and preferences leading up to the 42nd General Election.  Respondents provided information regarding their voting preferences as well as the perceived leadership qualities the 3 largest federal party leaders: Stephen Harper, Justin Trudeau, and Thomas Mulcair.  Respondents were queried on their news-reading and news-sharing habits with traditional, online, and social media. This study has a sample of 2503 respondents.
